description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Collect orbs and battle enemies in the sequel to X-Orbtek. Controls will feel familiar to twin stick shooter fans but the gameplay takes a different direction to   X-Orbtek II introduces combat and an all new way of orb collection, ideally suited for the game's local multiplayer. Fans of the original gameplay can play Classic mode or you can customise the gameplay.
description.short: Collect orbs and battle enemies in the sequel to X-Orbtek. Controls will feel familiar to twin stick shooter fans but the gameplay takes a different direction to   X-Orbtek II introduces combat and an all new way of orb collection, ideally suited for the game's local multiplayer. Fans of the original gameplay can play Classic mode or you can customise the gameplay.
